text: Paul Seward Trible Jr. (born December 29, 1946) is an American attorney and Republican politician. He was in the U.S. House of Representatives for three terms (1977 - 1983) and the U.S. Senate for one term (1983 - 1989). ==Other websites== *Biography at The Political Graveyard *Biography at Christopher Newport University *The Paul and Rosemary Trible Library at Christopher Newport University * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Baltimore Category:Educators from Virginia Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:United States senators from Virginia Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Virginia Category:Educators from Baltimore
title: Paul Trible
